title: Myk Prince of the Vends
description: An epic historical, action adventure, set in the 2nd century AD.A remnant tribe from the once great Celtic nation, the Vends, is under attack by the slave trading Alan tribes, the warlike Suebi, and an evil Druid priest. Just to make things worse, famine and disease stalk the land.What if, a small cavalry unit from the Roman empire, encountered a Mongol detachment of explorers, and fought a pitched skirmish? What if the Vends observed the skirmish and captured both the Roman and the Mongol survivors? Could the combined cultures produce a very powerful Vend tribe under the enlightened leadership of Lech and his wife Slava?A highly-researched, fictional story.Rated "R"259,000 words (Roughly equivalent to 970 pages in a mass market paperback).
author: Donald E. Zlotnik
